annotation.spannedText: That’s how you get an outbreak

classMention.mentionClass: That’s how you get an outbreak

annotation.spannedText: The measles vaccine is actually one of the most effective vaccines in the world

classMention.mentionClass: The measles vaccine is actually one of the most effective vaccines in the world

annotation.spannedText: the more important thing to focus on is vaccinating people to keep the disease from spreading like it has in Disneyland

classMention.mentionClass: the more important thing to focus on is vaccinating people to keep the disease from spreading like it has in Disneyland

annotation.spannedText: Without a change, those numbers will keep going up.

classMention.mentionClass: Without a change, those numbers will keep going up.

annotation.spannedText: Now, plainly, most of the people stricken with Mickey Mouse measles do not understand how vaccines work

classMention.mentionClass: Now, plainly, most of the people stricken with Mickey Mouse measles do not understand how vaccines work

annotation.spannedText: In the US, we’ve been doing pretty well keeping those numbers up

classMention.mentionClass: In the US, we’ve been doing pretty well keeping those numbers up

annotation.spannedText: why you’re better off being vaccinated even if you end up getting infected
